definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_random_patch_simple"><field name="tries">100</field><field name="xzSpread">5</field><field name="ySpread">3</field><field name="schedule_tick">FALSE</field><comment pinned="false" h="122" w="245">This block represents a block patch feature. The blocks will only generate in valid positions (for example, grass will never generate on a stone block).Patches of plants should be generated during the VEGETAL_DECORATION stage.</comment><value name="block"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:ElderLily</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block being placed</comment></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_all_of"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Pumpkins need to verify two conditions to be placed.</comment><value name="condition0"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="blockSet"><block type="block_holderset_tag"><field name="tag">minecraft:air</field></block></value></block></value><value name="condition1"><block type="block_predicate_matching_fluids"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field><field name="fluid">WATER</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_rarity"><field name="rarity">4</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is so the patch only generates in some of the chunks. The higher the value, the rarer the patch will be</comment><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each patch horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_height_range"><value name="height"><block type="height_provider_trapezoid"><field name="plateau">0</field><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">-45</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">-60</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We add a biome filter, so that the patches don't generate outside of the current biome</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="placement_heightmap" x="329" y="498"><field name="heightmap">MOTION_BLOCKING</field><comment pinned="false" h="94" w="179">We then move the patches at the highest non-air block, so that they generate on the surface. </comment></block><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute" x="1356" y="729"><field name="value">64</field></block></xml>
